lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: Why did Jairus come to Jesus?
answers: He wanted Jesus to visit his house

questions.text: What problem did the woman have?
answers: A bleeding disease that lasted 12 years

questions.text: What happened when she touched Jesus' clothes?
answers: She felt power come out of her

questions.text: When he knew power had gone out from him, what did Jesus say?
When the woman explained what happened, what did Jesus say?
answers: You should not have touched me

questions.text: What did the messenger say to Jairus?
answers: Your daughter has died. Leave Jesus alone.
Your wife wants you to come home quick

questions.text: After Jairus learned his daughter had died, what did Jesus say?
answers: Just believe and she will be healed
There is nothing to be done
It is too late for me to help

questions.text: What did Jesus say to the crowd?
What happened when Jesus told the girl to get up?
answers: She came to life and stood up

questions.text: What happens when sinners believe in Jesus?
answers: They are saved from forever death and given forever life
